page.title: 02Local news, Stickney.
page.content: Stickney village doesn't have a local newspaper.All the news goes into the Lincolnshire Boston Standard.It is put into one group by a lady who lives on Main Road,Stickney,Boston.Some of the news is about the Womens Institute general meeting's.The W.I. is a group of women who get together and discuss things privately. Other news is about events that are held in the village hall like car boot sales. The things that go on at the car boot sale are similar to a jumble sale.All you have to do is put the things in your car boot and take them to the field where it is held and sell them.That's why it is called a car boot sale.Also there is school news.Just lately the school has been in the newspaper about making clay pots.
